content.body: if mutation is desired to be avoided, `toEmpty()` could be used, but then its essentially `= []` and falls under the same issues as it, so it becomes worthless
content.formatted_body: if mutation is desired to be avoided, toEmpty() could be used, but then its essentially = [] and falls under the same issues as it, so it becomes worthless

content.body: Symmetry with other languages is generally something I'm in favor of when designing new features but is not in itself adequate reason to add a new feature when there is already a fine way of accomplishing the same thing.
